synopsis:

Hashizo has lost both parents when still a baby. He live with his elder brother – Go Kato who is the lead singer of the emerging rock band “Bee Hive”. This is a newly borned stars.
Yaeko Mitamura is an 18 year old girl working in her father’s Okonomiyaki restaurant.
There’re many unexpected things happen between Hashizo, Go, and YaeKo which make A romantic story with love, jealousy and famous.
